channel.title: Hey, could someone please help me?
channel.description: i have a place in my server and i am getting complains that skillerz place there is a place to mine rune essence but they aren't getting rune essence. can any1 help me please? how do you add rune ess for mining it from the rock?

item.title: Hey, could someone please help me?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Do what he said. Go there, and get the ID of the essence rock. In your client.java (or clickingmost), search for that number. If you don’t find it, add this under objectClick:

case ###: addItem(#, 1); sendMessage("You get some essence."); break;

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, could someone please help me?

item.title: Hey, could someone please help me?

item.title: Hey, could someone please help me?
item.dc:creator: @gon3d34d123 gon3d34d123
item.description:
@gon3d34d123 wrote:

Yes you can,

Get the ID from the item you get right now, and search for it in Client.java -> server folders.

Read full topic
